alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 15 at 9:41PM PST until February 16 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Valley drainage winds have been observed to be strong enough to produce wind chill concerns for portions of White Pine County. This includes Ely, where some of the coldest wind chill temperatures are currently being observed. Current wind chills of -20 or colder are present at Ely at this time and are expected to become colder thru the overnight.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Exposed skin can freeze in as little as 15 to 20 minutes when temperatures are minus 20!
